function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Aerosols remaining in the air after a person leaves a room, potentially remaining airborne for hours.","category":"Airborne transmission of covid-19 and results","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncertainty regarding the transmission of infection through air circulation","category":"Misinterpretation of data and
